question_text: A laptop is being reassembled after a screen replacement. Which two steps are essential to restore Wi-Fi signal functionality?
answer_options: Reseating the CPU into its socket
Reconnecting the antenna wires to the wireless card
Routing the antenna wires back into the display bezel
Reapplying thermal paste to the wireless module
correct_answer: Reconnecting the antenna wires to the wireless card
Routing the antenna wires back into the display bezel
explanation: Both antenna wire connection and correct display routing are vital for Wi-Fi and Bluetooth performance.
